name: PageMaker Template File
summary: Learn about .T65 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: T65 files can be found in your "Extras" folder in your PageMaker folder.
Examples of keystroke and character data held in a T65 character set: 0172 - ¬ 0174 - ® CS+6 - §

PageMaker was originally introduced in 1985 by Aldus but acquired in 1994 by Adobe. In 2004, Adobe stopped development of PageMaker replaced the program with InDesign. The Mac version of PageMaker will only run on OS 9 or earlier whereas the Windows version of PageMaker will run on XP or earlier.
NOTE: T65 files were replaced by the .PMT PageMaker file in PageMaker 7.0.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
